home.heroTitle: Discover the World with Horizon Travel
home.heroSubtitle: From Europe to tropical beaches, we make your dream vacation simple, affordable, and unforgettable.

about.paragraph1: At Horizon Travel, we've been helping travelers create unforgettable memories across the United States and around the globe. From weekend getaways to luxury tours, our mission is to make every journey seamless, exciting, and uniquely yours.
about.paragraph2: With trusted partners, curated experiences, and a dedicated team of travel experts, we ensure your vacations are stress-free from the moment you book to the moment you return home. Europe, Asia, the Americas, or tropical islands — we have you covered.

services.title: Our Travel Services
services.worldwideToursDesc: Explore breathtaking destinations across the US and beyond with fully customized tour packages.
services.hotelReservationsDesc: Stay in handpicked hotels and resorts at the best rates, with exclusive partnerships across the US.
services.localGuidesDesc: Discover hidden gems with our expert local guides who make every trip authentic and memorable.
services.eventGroupTravelDesc: From corporate retreats to family reunions, we handle all the details so you can enjoy stress-free events.

packages.title: Discover more destinations
packages.norwayDesc: Discover fjords, northern lights, and stunning landscapes. Hike, cruise, and experience the magic of Scandinavia.
packages.portugalDesc: Explore Lisbon, Porto, and the Algarve coast. Historic cities, beaches, and world-class cuisine await.
packages.maldivesDesc: Overwater bungalows, crystal-clear lagoons, and pristine beaches. The ultimate island escape.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: Whether you're planning your dream getaway or just need more information, our team is here to answer your questions. Reach out to us anytime!
contact.getInTouchDesc: Our travel experts are available Monday–Saturday to guide you with packages, custom itineraries, and bookings.
